1513.content:
Carnotaurus. A Large Theropod Carnivore known for being possibly the fastest sprinter of its size. There are two female Carnotaur Doctors to choose from:

1. Doctor Khana Helsinki. 7ft normally and extremely well …… “proportioned”. Actually, her normal size is 28ft but she is able to cut it down to 25% that by way of the advanced technological progress made by the 50th Century. This however, can be reverted by either when the device she uses runs out of power, but more often if she chooses to turn it off, or when she’s in an excited emotional state.

2. Doctor H’ressan Tallow. 30ft Carnotaur who works in a Region built in order to accommodate being of such size.
1513.title: Carnotaur Options

15131.content:
The advanced design of the Medical Room you were in, you expected. The medical equipment that read your vitals by way of sensors and not wires connected to your body, you expected. The holographic charts the doctor read over, you expected.

That your doctor was what appeared to be a Anthrosised Dinosaur. That you did not expect.

Getting a good look at her now, over her buttoned-up doctor’s lab coat that had her name, Dr Khana Helsinki, attached to the upper right pocket. She had on a quite conservative light-grey turtleneck sweater, and you could see a matching pair of trousers with her feet covered by a pair of shoes, made to fit her.

But what really had your attention was her long tail that swayed slightly as she read the details of your condition over, the clawed hands which only had four digits apiece, and her head, the horn-like protrusions over her eyes and the razor-sharp teeth. Scales and no hair, their colour being a soft brown, but muted green markings could also be made out.

“Ahhh…” You heard her sigh out.

“Sorry.” You couldn’t help but ask, the magnitude of what you were seeing numbing you to said magnitude.

“Oh, my apologies. Doctor Khana Helsinki, your personal doctor, and I’m afraid there is some unwelcome news for you.” She explained as she closed the distance.

“What?” You couldn’t help but blurt out flatly. What else could be wrong with you?

“It, it would appear that while you were having your medications to eliminate the various illness that plagued you, something else was accidentally included.”

“And that is?” Now, you were showing worry, fearing the worst.

“Oh, it’s, it’s nothing fatal.” She dismissed with a wave, but now you could see her having to work to compose herself. “What was added was a hormone modifying agent, it’s effect is to……is to alter your scent. Making. You.” Her breathing was starting to become slower, heavier. And there was a look in her eyes, like a predator that had secured its prey.

“What!? What has it made me!?” You demanded as you tried to shuffle yourself away, as she fought for control.

“Attractive. To certain species.” She replied once she had a grip on herself again. “Now, as your personal doctor, it’s my job to not only make sure your physically and mentally sound, but to aid you in adapting to life here in 4928.”

“That is…2,900 years?” You work out almost gawking at the fact.

“You’ve been Cryo-frozen for a long time, and a lot has changed since you were placed into you deep sleep.” Dr Khana purred out, her control slipping again as she placed a hand on you, surprisingly warm given her species. “So we need to aid you in restarting your…your…your…”

The last words wouldn’t come as she began to huff and puff with a dangerous expression. And as she came in closer still to get a long sniff of you, you could’ve sworn that her clothes weren’t as tight-fitting as they used to be only a minute before.
15131.title: Doctor Khana Helsinki

155.content:
Let's take a brief look at dragons in Saurian City.

European dragons - Tend to have big breasts and asses. A number of them also have wings. They also tend to have a big stomach. A warning, they tend to be greedy and possessive. So there is a high chance you'll be seen as either a pet or a toy. Some have the capability to have a stomach where they'll keep you unharmed, so it's more of a pouch that just happens to be inside of them.

Asian dragons - They tend to be thin and tall. They are also quite skilled in languages. They also are kind of sensitive with how they are seen in society. Their personality is somewhat more temperamental when compared to the European dragons. As for how they might see you when they fall under your scent, perhaps either a servant or a secret lover from a lower class?
155.title: more races.

choices: Some other colored scaled dragon doctor
1551.content:
So what color was the Dragon's scales? The color does have an effect on the personality of the dragon.

Red - Red scaled dragons tend to be more seductive, but are more temperamental than the other color scales. Then again, their scales in the right light glisten like fire. They also quite affectionate and are very willing to hug and kiss their toys/mates, regardless of what the people around them think.

Green - tend to quite jealous and possessive in a relationship. Otherwise tend to be practical, but follows whatever traditions they were raised with. So if the dragon was raised with the belief to dominate the relationship, don't expect to have much of a say in it. The bright side is that it takes a lot to depress them. Whenever others get depressed, the green-scaled dragons try to say something to cheer them up or at least look out for any dangerous signs..
1551.title: European dragon doctor

1552.content:
They are still many types of Eastern dragons, and like their western counterparts, most of them devided by the colors. (They are alos divided by the number of talon, they have on their hands, but that's another story.) They are all tall, and thin, and with small but firm breasts, but sometime big butt.

Blue: Blue eastern dragons are normal calm and collective, but can become dangerous, when provoke. Personality-wise, they are michevious, but try go to far with their jokes or pranks Blue scales tend to use more magic to change things rather than leave things are they are. They are romantic beings, and enjoy long relationship, over short lustful adventure. They love to be in control, but will speak to others are equals, not servants. They also won't use flattery.

Green: Green eastern dragons are short-tempered, even compared to western dragons. They can be loving beings, but are prone to jeolously, They don't use magic to often, but when they do, what out. They often enjoy short "one night stand relationships" than long one. When it clear that they are the dominate one in the relationship, they have no compassion with their parnters when they use insterest. (So expect to be trades a lot.)

Other type: Yellow, Red, and Mix
1552.title: Asian dragon doctor

choices: "Yes, I was just thinking about something else. Now for the tests."
"I need to smuggle my new partner out of here..."
15522.content:
In walked a rather tall, thin, green dragon. She had on black sweatpants, a blue shirt, and the medical labcoat. She had a nice figure, though it seemed to favor her behind, as her breasts seemed quite smaller by comparison. That was how you were able to tell that she was female.

Her height was very tall. She could easily hold you like a doll-er... Action figure.

She had been looking at a futuristic medical chart, one akin to the PADDs from Star Trek the Next generation.

When she got close enough to almost step on you, she stopped. Then to your surprise, she quickly shrank. Now she was only a few feet taller than you.

"I am Dr. Mizuno. I will be performing a few tests and answering... answering..." The green Asian dragon said before trailing off, sniffing the air as she looked around. Once she realized that the scent was coming from you, she briefly smiled in a lustful manner before she realized what she had been doing. With a serious-looking face, she said, "I will also be answering questions if you have any."

"How were you able to change size?" You asked.

"Short answer - magic. a somewhat longer answer- nanomachines and specific genetic engineering that gives me quite a bit of control of energy-matter manipulation." Dr. Mizuno answered. "A longer answer would require a few more degrees in your possession."

'Didn't need to hear that last part...' You thought. For a moment, you swore that her breathing had gotten quicker for a moment and her eyes seemed a bit fogged over. "Is everything alright?"

She took a deep breath before she said...
15522.title: Green Asian Dragon Doctor

155312.content:
Anatotitan are among the largest duckbill anthros, standing at approximately 20 feet tall at the absolute maximum. Extremely heavyset, with titanic breasts, rears, hips, and stomachs, these dinosaurs at first look quite harmless, like giant scale-covered anthropomorphic cattle. However, they are anything but - Anatotitan have incredible strength and durability, able to lift and throw immense weights and withstand most smaller firearms, and their long, thick tails can be used as devastating bludgeoning weapons.

In terms of personality, Anatotitan are fairly grumpy and defensive - a holdover from their days as prey animals. They're distrustful of carnivores, particularly large theropods, and they're slow to trust such creatures. Towards smaller beings like humans, however, they have almost the exact opposite attitude, adopting a protective, almost motherly air towards them, striving to protect them from harm and to care for them.

So, let's begin our rundown of these titanic matronly juggernauts.
155312.title: Anatotitan

info.brief_description: Awaken in a city of humans, Dinosaurs, and Dragons..
info.description:
The original belonged to HeptagonHail. They left the site and deleted everything of their profile. However, I really liked Saurian city, so I'm going to put up this version.

Now for the rules.

1.) I'd like for the MC to be the sole Male. I don't mind there being other guys. they just can't be main characters or them being in sex scenes.

2.) This is a femdom story. However, I don't mind the guy getting control every once in a while. Just make sure that the women get control back after awhile.

3.) No shrinking the guy. The women are big enough. However, I don't mind if the giant women temporarily shrink themselves to the guy's size.

4.) No killing off the Guy. Also, try not to end a story line. You can put an 'THE END' at the end of your story, but only as long as you put up choices for others to continue your story.

5.) Soft vore is fine. Example is putting people in their mouths and lightly chewing without breaking bones or skin. Hard vore is not allowed.

EDIT on 7/7/2015

6.) If you wish to have giant furries, please stick with anthro versions of ones that were in Dinosaur or caveman times. Still try to have either a dinolady or lady dragon make an appearance now and then.

---

Now here's something to keep in mind. The women of the future city go after the guy because of his scent. The reason why his scent attracts them is because of the concoctions used on his body to cure the diseases he had.
